send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page

conversation.message_text: Montblanc: Welcome to Montblanc! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Montblanc: Text us back with any questions you have while shopping and don't forget to save our contact to get exclusive updates!
Montblanc: Welcome to the inspirational world of Montblanc. Enjoy $15 off your next order above $300 using code WORLDOFMTB at checkout https://montblanc.attn.tv/aGiJILb9eDCz .
Montblanc: Hi there, this is Sarah. Thanks for visiting Montblanc.com. Are you looking for anything in particular today? https://montblanc.attn.tv/ab7nDuLHlGgE
Montblanc: We noticed you were viewing one of our beautiful creations. Take another look and enjoy complimentary shipping: montblanc.attn.tv/a7v4mPpDHdNY .
Do you repair pen caps.
Template used: "Do you have a repair shop?"; last updated: 2023-10-27 20:42:34.455

Montblanc: Hi, thanks for reaching out. To ensure the highest quality of service and care when your item needs to be repaired or serviced, Montblanc has partnered with My Jewelry Repair. My Jewelry Repair specializes in repairs for all Montblanc products including Writing Instruments, Watches, Leather Goods, and Accessories, and accepts Montblanc products from everywhere across the United States.

To request a repair online with My Jewelry Repair for your Montblanc item, please access this link - https://montblanc.attn.tv/a7Qs6pQMuxZu/

You can also contact My Jewelry Repair directly by calling 833-625-1930 Monday to Friday between 12 PM to 8 PM ET or by email at montblancservice@myjewelryrepair.com for all inquiries related to repairing your product.

You can also bring your Montblanc product to a Montblanc boutique. Please use our Store Locator tool - https://montblanc.attn.tv/a2WaJAinN3Ak to find your nearest boutique.

For additional Montblanc authorized repair locations for watches in the United States, please check here for a list of locations: https://montblanc.attn.tv/avtrj5yflE8e

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
Send to CS for refund inquiries
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo if the cx first message is ok, no, etc.
Don't use the word "off" when talking about promotions
dos_and_donts: Don't proactively offer to find pricing info, redirect them to the website instead
promo_and_exclusions: Do not offer a coupon to first time purchasers/subscribers. There is not an active discount code at this time. Use DCI shortcut

conversation.message_text: Nectar: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel. Phone support: (888) 863-2827.
Nectar: You're in!

Nectar: Sleep goals? Unlocked.

Mattress + adjustable base + bedding set = savings of up to 66% on your complete setup:
nectarsleep.attn.tv/a0pVtyMpIfVB

Nectar: Winter = hibernation mode? Get next-level comfort & save up to 66% on our Adjustable Bundle (bedding included): nectarsleep.attn.tv/a2nCFftywmXe
.

Nectar: Quinn here: You can save up to 50% on your cart.
Wondering if now's the time? It is. Need help? Just say the word: nectarsleep.attn.tv/a7tLzyyZABTj
.
What is the difference between the classic and premier mattress besides the price

Nectar: The Nectar Premier offers a cooler sleep with more cool-to-the-touch polyethylene and phase change material for temperature regulation. More details at https://nectarsleep.attn.tv/aPF85uj0EJZ5.
If I purchase the split king do I need 2 adjustable bases
Nectar: Yes, the Split King is made from two Twin XL adjustable bases and two Twin XL mattresses being placed side by side to create a King-sized bed.

escalate: ESC expired codes/discount code issues, ask for cart ID and add it in esc notes
Don't send to CS for this client, ESC if needed
For retroactive discount requests add discount % in ESC note
ESC if a customer requests a different resolution, after their escalation was resolved
dos_and_donts: Fun Bucks AREN'T rewards points, those are given during exchanges
promo_and_exclusions: This brand does not use coupon codes or promotions. All of their discounts are exclusively link-based and are applied automatically to the shopping cart upon checkout when the appropriate conditions are met
Please do not advise customers to use promotional codes, do not provide them with any codes, and do not direct them to look on the website for additional codes
They do not have any promotional code text fields on site to facilitate use

conversation.message_text: Bonafide: Reply Y to receive recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Bonafide.
Bonafide: Welcome to Bonafide! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Bonafide: Welcome to menopause, minus the suffering. Save over 40% on your 1st subscription order with code SMS20. Shop now: https://bonafide.attn.tv/a91cXwGqtCsh
Bonafide: Stay connected on your menopause journey with Bonafide! Save our number to your contacts for easy access to expert advice, tips, and support. https://bonafide.attn.tv/aa-pRww6XLQi

Bonafide: There's a reason Bonafide is trusted by over 1 million women. Check out our solutions for hot flashes, vaginal dryness and odor, sexual satisfaction, mood swings, wrinkles, and thinning hair. bonafide.attn.tv/afaHlcEMlqiL
Bonafide: Hi, this is Heather from Bonafide! Let me know if you have any product questions about Clairvee! bonafide.attn.tv/aTn2q6dF2zH9
Is subscription cheaper than 3 month plan

Bonafide: Thanks for reaching out! The 3-month plan is cheaper per month than the standard subscription because shipping costs are reduced. If you're planning to stay consistent with your routine, the 3- or 6-month options are the best way to save.
Is 6 month option better or same price as 3 month option?

Bonafide: Thanks for the follow-up question! The 6-month plan is a better value than the 3-month option. It lowers your monthly cost even more. Both multi-month plans are cheaper than the standard subscription, so if you're planning to stay consistent, the 6-month option gives you the best savings.
